hibernate-mapping.query: from Person where account = ? and password = ?
from Article where time like ? and cast(pass as string) = ? and cast(type as string) = ? Order by uptime desc
from Product as p where p.state = 1 and p.pass = 1 and p.person.person_id = ? Order by uptime desc
from Demand as p where p.state = 1 and p.pass = 1 and p.person.person_id = ? Order by uptime desc
from Product as p where p.state != 1 and p.pass = 1 and p.person.person_id = ? Order by uptime desc
from Prorecord as pr where pr.person.person_id = ? and pr.action.product.state = 1 order by recordtime desc
from Demrecord as dr where dr.demand.demand_id = ? order by recordtime desc
from Auth as a where a.role.role_id = ?
from ProAction p where p.product.product_id = ? order by endtime desc
from Order as o where o.person.person_id = ? and o.type = ? order by buytime desc
from Order as o where o.demand.person.person_id = ? and o.type = ? order by buytime desc
from Product as p where (p.productname like ? or p.person.realname like ?) and p.state != -1 order by p.uptime desc
from Demand as d where d.state = 1 and d.key.keyname like ? and ( d.person.realname like ? or d.introduce like ?) order by d.uptime desc
